column1: Smoque BBQ////The brisket at Smoque is really something to write home about. So rich and smokey and unbelievably tasty. The chicken is good too
column2: really recommended if you like smoked chicken. I had to give the ribs a few tries before I warmed up to them
column3: but I think they're great. The meat definitely doesn't fall off the bone
column4: you're going to be using your jaw a little (which isn't necessarily a bad thing
column5: just depends on your preference) but the ribs are charred in that special way that brings out every ounce of flavor in the meat.
